hints_html: Recall \(\displaystyle (AB)^T = B^TA^T\) and \(\displaystyle (AB)^{-1} = B^{-1}A^{-1}\) for invertible matrices.
hints_latex:
Recall $\displaystyle (AB)^T = B^TA^T$ and
$\displaystyle (AB)^{-1} = B^{-1}A^{-1}$ for invertible matrices.
hints_raw: Recall <math>\displaystyle (AB)^T = B^TA^T </math> and <math> \displaystyle(AB)^{-1} = B^{-1}A^{-1} </math> for invertible matrices.
question: A 20
sols_html:
Only (d) is correct.

Recall \(\displaystyle (AB)^T = B^TA^T\) and \(\displaystyle (AB)^{-1} = B^{-1}A^{-1}\) for invertible matrices. Then

\[\begin{aligned} \displaystyle(A(BC)^{-1}D)^T = (AC^{-1}B^{-1}D)^T = D^{T}(B^{-1})^{T}(C^{-1})^{T}A^{T}\end{aligned}\]
sols_raw:
Only (d) is correct. 

Recall <math>\displaystyle (AB)^T = B^TA^T </math> and <math> \displaystyle(AB)^{-1} = B^{-1}A^{-1} </math> for invertible matrices. Then 
:<math> \displaystyle(A(BC)^{-1}D)^T = (AC^{-1}B^{-1}D)^T = D^{T}(B^{-1})^{T}(C^{-1})^{T}A^{T}  </math>
statement_html:
Let A, B, C and D be four size \(3\times 3\) invertible matrices. Circle all the options below that are equal to the matrix \(\displaystyle (A(BC)^{-1}D)^{T}\) independent of what A,B,C and D are. No explanation required.

(a) \(\displaystyle A^{T}B^{-T}C^{-T}D^{T}\)

(b) \(\displaystyle A^{T}(B^{-1})^{T}(C^{-1})^{T}D^{T}\)

(c) \(\displaystyle A^{T}(C^{-1})^{T}(B^{-1})^{T}D^{T}\)

(d) \(\displaystyle D^{T}(B^{-1})^{T}(C^{-1})^{T}A^{T}\)

(e) \(\displaystyle D^{T}(C^{-1})^{T}(B^{-1})^{T}A^{T}\)
statement_latex:
Let \emph{A}, \emph{B}, \emph{C} and \emph{D} be four size $3\times 3$
invertible matrices. Circle all the options below that are equal to the
matrix $\displaystyle (A(BC)^{-1}D)^{T}$ independent of what
\emph{A},\emph{B},\emph{C} and \emph{D} are. No explanation required.

(a) $\displaystyle A^{T}B^{-T}C^{-T}D^{T}$

(b) $\displaystyle A^{T}(B^{-1})^{T}(C^{-1})^{T}D^{T}$

(c) $\displaystyle A^{T}(C^{-1})^{T}(B^{-1})^{T}D^{T}$

(d) $\displaystyle D^{T}(B^{-1})^{T}(C^{-1})^{T}A^{T}$

(e) $\displaystyle D^{T}(C^{-1})^{T}(B^{-1})^{T}A^{T}$
statement_raw:
Let ''A'', ''B'', ''C'' and ''D'' be four size <math> 3\times 3</math> invertible matrices. Circle all the options below that are equal to the matrix <math>\displaystyle (A(BC)^{-1}D)^{T} </math> independent of what ''A'',''B'',''C'' and ''D'' are. No explanation required.

(a) <math>\displaystyle A^{T}B^{-T}C^{-T}D^{T} </math>

(b) <math>\displaystyle A^{T}(B^{-1})^{T}(C^{-1})^{T}D^{T} </math>

(c) <math>\displaystyle A^{T}(C^{-1})^{T}(B^{-1})^{T}D^{T} </math>

(d) <math>\displaystyle D^{T}(B^{-1})^{T}(C^{-1})^{T}A^{T} </math>

(e) <math>\displaystyle D^{T}(C^{-1})^{T}(B^{-1})^{T}A^{T} </math>
